meta.name: More User Tags
meta.tagline: Adds tags for webhooks and moderative roles (owner, admin, etc.)
meta.description: Displays additional user tags in chat and member lists based on server permissions. Supports Owner, Admin, Staff, Mod, VC Mod, Chat Mod, and Webhook tags with customizable text and visibility. [ported from Vencord]
